Test Name: Miscellaneous Nationwide Children's Hospital Laboratory Tests
Specimen Type: Varies by test (e.g., blood, serum, plasma, urine)
Purpose: To generate accurate, reliable, and timely results during the analytical phase of miscellaneous laboratory tests.
Container: Appropriate specimen container for the specific test (e.g., blood collection tube, urine cup, aliquot tube)
Equipment: Analytical instruments including hematology, chemistry, and immunoassay analyzers, along with standard laboratory supplies and the Laboratory Information System (LIS)
